price: 49. Aadmigu marnaba kama daalo khayr bariga, hadduuse shar taabto, markaas waa quustaa, rajo beel ah.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
